thread.title: Texas’ Jarrett Allen stole this West Virginia defender’s soul with a dunk
thread.title_full: Texas’ Jarrett Allen stole this West Virginia defender’s soul with a dunk

author: Richard Johnson
title: Texas’ Jarrett Allen stole this West Virginia defender’s soul with a dunk
text:
My goodness. 
The NBA’s slam dunk contest was extremely dull on Saturday night. But it’s ok because Texas’ Jarrett Allen would have gotten a 10 for this one. 
Allen stands at a listed height of 6’11 but his 7’6 wingspan was on full display here and he needed every inch to pull this dunk off. He stops his momentum midair to throw down with savagery. 
And Allen didn’t dunk over some slouch either. He flushed this dunk home over Sagaba Konate, who leads the Mountaineers in blocks-per-game with 1.4.
